name: Super Gem Quest - The Jewels (pro version)
name_original: Super Gem Quest - The Jewels (pro version)
description:
The pro version of Super Gem Quest - The Jewels.
- Ad free.
- Continue/Retry levels with no coins. Play at your pace!
- Total 120 LEVELS and keep updating.

If you love Jewel Quest game then we're sure you will love this game!
If you never played Jewel Quest game you can try the free version of "Super Gem Quest".
